meanings.sent1: The elemental rules of the game are easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: She had an elemental understanding of math concepts.
meanings.sent3: The elemental recipe for pancakes only had three ingredients.
meanings.sent4: His elemental approach to problem-solving was refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The elemental truth is that kindness goes a long way.

meanings.definition: Related to the forces of nature
meanings.sent1: The storm's elemental power was awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent2: The elemental beauty of the waterfall left us speechless.
meanings.sent3: The elemental wind played with the leaves in a playful dance.
meanings.sent4: Her elemental presence in the forest felt mystical.
meanings.sent5: The elemental fury of the volcano could be felt for miles.

meanings.definition: Having the power of a force of nature
meanings.sent1: The superhero's elemental strength saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The elemental force of the tsunami was devastating.
meanings.sent3: His elemental speed on the track amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: The elemental roar of the lion echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The elemental power of music can move hearts and minds.

meanings.sent1: The recipe was so elemental that even a beginner could follow it.
meanings.sent2: Her elemental approach to fashion was minimalistic yet stylish.
meanings.sent3: The elemental design of the house made it cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: His elemental explanation made the complex topic easy to grasp.
meanings.sent5: The elemental joy of a child playing is infectious.
